name: Trade – World Bank (2016) & OECD Economic Outlook (2007)
title: Trade – World Bank (2016) & OECD Economic Outlook (2007)
description: Food comprises the commodities in SITC sections 0 (food and live animals), 1 (beverages and tobacco), and 4 (animal and vegetable oils and fats) and SITC division 22 (oil seeds, oil nuts, and oil kernels).
